title: Remarks by President Trump and Prime Minister Johnson of the United Kingdom Before Working Breakfast | Biarritz, France – The White House
content:
Remarks			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 25, 2019
Hotel du Palais
Biarritz, France8:16 A.M. CESTPRESIDENT TRUMP:  Hello, folks.  How are you?  (Inaudible.)PRIME MINISTER JOHNSON:  (Inaudible).PRESIDENT TRUMP:  Thank you, folks.  Do you know who this is?  Does everybody know?  He’s going to be a fantastic Prime Minister.  And we’re having very, very good meetings.  So far, so good.PRIME MINISTER JOHNSON:  We’re having terrific meetings.  And we’re going to do a fantastic deal once we clear up some of the obstacles in our path.PRESIDENT TRUMP:  And that’s a fantastic thing for us.  We’re talking about many different deals, but we’re having a good time.  As far as UK and the United States, we’re working on a very big trade deal and I think it’s going to work out very well.So thank you very much.  See you later.  Thank you.END            8:17 A.M. CEST
